        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="3938" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="3938" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.96</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="482">482</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="79"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Hammam Bouquet</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. <b>Hammam Bouquet</b> was launched in 1872. The nose behind this fragrance is William Penhaligon. Top notes are Lavender and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose, Orris Root, Jasmine and Cedar; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood and Amber. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Hammam Bouquet by Penhaligon`s is a woody fragrance for men. Hammam Bouquet was launched in 1872. Top notes are lavender and bergamot; middle notes are bulgarian rose, orris root, jasmine and cedar; base notes are sandalwood, amber and musk.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="3938"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 4.625rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94590744661054; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.101.jpg" style="width: 3.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orris-Root-101.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orris Root</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89903623487364; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 3.3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75965265410792; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 2.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedar</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 4.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92711643842836; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 3.475rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.83058930759063; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 2.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div></div>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365763" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Berrybell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137570.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Berrybell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137570">Berrybell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732958854" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I ordered a sample for this to try it out, and I partially like it. Reminds me of a character from a manga that I read in middle school...Gilbert Cocteau😅. Floral, powdery, musky, slightly old fashioned, and dominant. A bit too heady for me, but wearable with around 2- 3 sprays!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="2365763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=2365763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Gloriously Victorian ❤️</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="2340082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=2340082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="2318840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=2318840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248044" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dogandbroom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1990867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dogandbroom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ted-Lapidus/Oud-Blanc-28824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Blanc"title="Oud Blanc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248044ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248044" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1990867">dogandbroom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-13">08/13/24 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Official miniature from the Y2K era. Reminds me of a more civilized version of Dali pour homme, with the rose taking the place of the patchouli. Slightly urinous and intensely floral and musky. Of course, Bouquet Hammam is over a 100 years older and on paper, the notes are only partially congruent but apart from BH's rose forward profile, they both you an olfactive experience which is similar enough, that I'm not sure you need to own both.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="2248044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=2248044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2171166" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lucius Vorenus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149459"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lucius Vorenus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2171166ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2171166" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149459">Lucius Vorenus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 04:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite perfume in the universe. There is NOTHING like Hammam Bouquet in the world since 1872. It's a magical, mythical perfume. I have an irrational fear of losing it, which is why I bought seven bottles. The experience it gives me is indescribable. Hammam Bouquet always gives me the same feeling I'd get if I found a young Alain Delon, the most beautiful man in the universe, completely naked on my bed at home. HB brings me paroxysms of pleasure, ecstasy, delirium. It's a frenzy.<br />
<br />
Seriously.<br />
<br />
But I'll try to describe HB objectively. First comes a brief, short-lived and very powerful sensation of lavender and bergamot, followed immediately by the intoxicating, aromatic and heady presence of the central accord of Rose, Orris and Jasmine. This intoxicating and vaporous accord remains for several hours, in a progressively less intoxicating but incredibly beautiful way, and is slowly replaced by delicious and powerful animalic notes of musk mixed with an incredibly natural sandalwood. Penhaligons' ingredients are of the highest quality, it doesn't get any better than that.<br />
<br />
This was the perfume worn by the English Lords at the end of the 19th century, when England was still the richest and most sophisticated of nations. The intoxicating nature of the perfume contrasts paradoxically with the controlled nature and well-known phlegm of the British. How could they behave so much, be so repressed, and at the same time be perfumed with this sensual fragrance?<br />
<br />
This perfume was created based on the smell of a Turkish sauna that existed near the Penhaligon's store at the time. The perfume's intoxicating, LANGUID sensation is really reminiscent of the steamy atmosphere of the sauna, and the smell of roses that must have been there.<br />
<br />
Penhaligon's almost went out of business a some time ago, but was saved by filmmaker Franco Zefirelli, who invested in the company and saved it for one reason: Hammam Bouquet was his favorite perfume, because it was the signature scent of another man whom Zefirelli admired and with whom he had an affair in his youth: Count Luchino Visconti, also a filmmaker (director of The Leopard, Death in Venice and Rocco and His Brothers). Visconti always smelled of Hammam Bouquet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="2171166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=2171166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2089355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2089355" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Le 3e Homme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Le 3e Homme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/4-20-PM-72228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="4.20 PM"title="4.20 PM"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2089355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2089355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536791">Le 3e Homme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh so old-fashioned, anti-modern and decadent, gothic, dandy, and so obviously British. A skanky, dark, sultry and animalic rose. Archaic and Stiff? Maybe. Essential? Definitely. Simply the very best of Penhaligon's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="2089355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=2089355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983832" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="handyup"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="handyup" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); spicy (little bit).  No 5. flanker</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1983832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1983832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love Penhaligon's, I've owned and tried many. Was stoked to find a vintage bottle of this, the very first release from the house, and the only one credited to William Penhaligon as the perfumer!<br />
<br />
Extremely powerful old school florals and musks. Only fragrance I can recall that almost made me physically sick. Tried it several times (never outside my house) but I couldn't will myself I'm liking it. Absolutely unwearable for me even though the historical significance is super cool. <br />
_______________________<br />
Scent 1/10<br />
Performance 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1983033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1983033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1875979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frangipanilove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.528960.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frangipanilove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Aqua-Vitae-Forte-31404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Vitae Forte"title="Aqua Vitae Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1875979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1875979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960">Frangipanilove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-11">07/11/23 02:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is not for me. Aromatic lavender combined with rose on backdrop of woods with some powdery orris root and musks. I find it an odd combination. Maybe the original was different with more natural raw materials, I don’t know. Or maybe the aromatic top was put there to enable a gentleman veer stealthily into the sweet powdery territory. How do I put this - Hammam bouquet is not very virile. Pure baby powder in a couple of hours. Makes me think of chubby eunuchs in hammams and god knows what.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1875979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1875979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1806392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664252">Neverapeoplepleaser</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-20">02/20/23 13:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance! I wear it and also love it on my husband. Definitely not a crowd pleaser, but I wear this for me when I want cheering up and to feel opulent and decadent. I wouldn't wear it to a restaurant or around food as its quite overbearing. Strong lavender, rose and powder. I read someone say it reminds them of victoriana death, decay and vampires and I totally get what they mean! A rich, voluptuous, olde worlde gothic fragrance. Truly unique!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1764827"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1764827#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1739781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143312">Victor Lahovary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-04">11/04/22 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A rich and mesmerising scent, blending exquisitely high quality ingredients, that will appeal to those who have a fascination for Oriental fragrances. Velvety rose, luscious and then powdery, to mention just what comes to mind first. It has a very good sillage and it lasts for many hours. I am currently writing this 12 hours after having sprayed it, and it is still "palpable"... Classy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1680963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1680963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1638724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1638724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Printeza7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Printeza7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Rose-Anonyme-16013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Anonyme"title="Rose Anonyme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1638724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1638724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); But he didn't like it! It's powerful, it's elegant and it's rich!! Very unique smell, so very niche, it brings you right back to the Victorian times, where a gentleman nicely dress would add a drop on his costume of this scent of pure elegance. Class but I can see for the modern world it would be a challenge. I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1638724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1638724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VETTIVAER"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VETTIVAER" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436289">VETTIVAER</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 17:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smell jasmine and laurel leaf oil. Not much else. White florals and herbs supported by woods.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1509317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1509317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1457071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1457071" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1457071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1457071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-04">12/04/21 01:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very heady start followed by a strangely comforting development. I wouldn't connect this to a hammam right away, more like a barbershop (where it was used, as far as I get it). It's thick, decadent, very well-blended and really hard to miss - not in terms of sillage but in terms of being something rather unique. Unfortunately, I can't imagine wearing this but then, I'm not the target  group... The worst thing about this scent is that after a few hours it becomes sickening - like I've changed clothes with a homeless man. 😔</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1457071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1457071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1452159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1452159" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Descartes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/28511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.28511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Descartes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Bois-du-Portugal-3805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois du Portugal"title="Bois du Portugal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1452159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1452159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/28511">Descartes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-25">11/25/21 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My God! some comments comparing Hamman Bouquet with Guerlain's Habit Rouge or Chanel Egoists, shocking! no resemblance between both, two opposite fragrances. <br />
Hammam Bouquet is a sentimental Victorian spicy rose blended with Lavander: is dusty, citric, iris powdery, lipstick sweet. A mature fragrance for perfume collectors and Dandys to wear on special occasions. Test before you buy a full bottle. I own a full bottle and I've been spraying on and off for the past 15 years and the bottle is still 90% full. Unisex but I think on a man smells more balance and sexy while on a young woman she would smell from a bygone era.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1452159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1452159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1400351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1400351" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TRbll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TRbll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1400351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1400351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381024">TRbll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-28">08/28/21 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have mixed feelings about this cologne. It recalls corpses floating down the river of Victorian Era London. I'm thinking of vampires and funeral parlours. I like the idea of it, but trying to eat while I'm wearing it makes me feel a bit ill. I'm not sure it would be appealing to wear on a date, but I'm going to try to stick it out 😂.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1400351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1400351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1392134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1392134" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faellen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.862923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faellen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Candied-Fantasy-93613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Candied Fantasy"title="Candied Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1392134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1392134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923">Faellen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-14">08/14/21 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I managed to obtain a tester of this, and fell instantly in love.<br />
Hammam Bouquet - unsurprisingly - takes me right back to the hammam I visited in Turkey... it reminds me of the soap used there. Baby powdery rose and lavender. Old fashioned shaving foam? Definitely unisex, leaning towards feminine in this day and age.<br />
I like to spray it on in the evenings, after a warm bath. I'm not sure why, but it makes me feel cleaner!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1392134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1392134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1327564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1327564" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhonePotato"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhonePotato" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aaron-Terence-Hughes/Supernova-90884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Supernova"title="Supernova"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1327564ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1327564" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224212">PhonePotato</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-18">04/18/21 05:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes, you should wear whatever fragrance you want BUT this one should be reserved for Victorian themed Halloween costumes. This is seems like a time capsule for me more that any other fragrance I’ve come across. It doesn’t smell dated, it smells antique. This is the signature scent of the Antiques Roadshow. <br />
<br />
I personally love using this before bed when I want to drift off and dream of this long gone era, or when I’m watching Sherlock Holmes shows.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1327564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1327564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1303599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1303599" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="albert.allowenda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311941"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311941.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="albert.allowenda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ishq-Al-Shuyukh-Gold-81121.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81121.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ishq Al Shuyukh Gold"title="Ishq Al Shuyukh Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1303599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1303599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311941">albert.allowenda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-06">03/06/21 22:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it! Love it! and . . . Love it!!!!!!<br />
<br />
It's just like an opening door to the classical Victorian era where masculinity and dandyism are the main principles of every gentleman in every corner of the street.<br />
<br />
Also, . . .<br />
<br />
If you want to feel how it's like to have confidence, strength, and firm in yourself, make sure to try it.<br />
<br />
PERSONAL SCORE : 9,9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1303599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1303599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1097917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1097917" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaurg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1117052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaurg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1097917ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1097917" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1117052">kaurg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-15">09/15/19 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powdery rose scent similar to Habit Rouge. This rose accord smells more like rose soap or some candy, not the fresh flower. Smells unisex or even feminine. A more masculine/woody/not-powdery version of this theme would be Chanel Egoiste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1097917"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1097917#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1088129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1088129" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fanny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/9801"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.9801.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fanny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jacomo/Silences-1550.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1550.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silences"title="Silences"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1088129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1088129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/9801">fanny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-15">08/15/19 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Capital Goth Perfume.<br />
Do not mind the opening, it does not last too long.<br />
One gets rewarded with a fresh yet dark lavender rose that will last and last.<br />
Exceptional job.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1088129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1088129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1086849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181640">ivadim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-11">08/11/19 14:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Стартът ми напомня индрише с роза, после идва плътна лавандула пак с 🌹, постепенно изплуват дървесни и пудрени нотки, това е приказен аромат, който ме пренася в уютна къща, пълна с любими неща, в която се усеща ухание от двора, примесено с ароматни соли за вана. Помаден, пудрен и същевременно чист аромат. Кедърът постепенно заема видно място и прекрасно балансира композицията.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1086849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1086849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1072314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1069925" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="echo4kilo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="echo4kilo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Room-237-30364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Room 237"title="Room 237"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1069925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1069925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785">echo4kilo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-13">06/13/19 21:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WOW. Penhaligon's has come a long way. I love history and wanted to smell the first fragrance they produced. Now, clearly it is from 147 years ago. Everyone smelled terrible back then. No one bathed on a regular basis so you needed something strong to cover up the smell. This would do it. It is something powerful. I smell a mix of moth balls, urinal cake, and anger. I love Penhaligon's. I own 3 full bottles of other Penhaligan's fragrances and would own more if I wasn't poor, but Hammam Bouquet is more suited for Molotov cocktails than a modern fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1069925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1069925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1014276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1014276" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="andrew1983"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1089141.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="andrew1983" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1014276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1014276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089141">andrew1983</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-28">12/28/18 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hammam Bouquet is an ancient smelling scent (made in 1872) that will bring you backwards in time, after a turkish bath of the 19th century in the center of London. <br />
<br />
It is reminiscent of old memories, the orient that lives in the north of Europe in that period.<br />
<br />
Despite it is a deep fragrance, with a big soul (musk, amber and woodsy notes), it preserve a "british clearness" (rose, lavander and jasmine notes).<br />
<br />
Vote: 10/10 - I love it... for fall / wintertime</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="1014276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=1014276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent977323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc977323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richmilton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1020788"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1020788.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="richmilton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Heritage-Eau-de-Toilette-1880.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1880.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heritage Eau de Toilette"title="Heritage Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma977323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd977323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1020788">richmilton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-31">08/31/18 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral, powdery and old school. It reminds me of Tabac Cologne with some added rose, although the rose is very minimal here, at least to my nose. Obviously its of higher quality than the budget priced Tabac... which has long been a staple after my evening shower ritual. <br />
<br />
Hammam Bouquet, despite its floral name, is not by any means a feminine fragrance, although it does lean unisex. My wife loves to snuggle for a long time when I wear this fragrance, which is why I only wear it when I miss her feminine touch... wink wink.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="977323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=977323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent973695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc973695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xmelldefrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1152260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xmelldefrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Daniel-Josier/Tuberose-45073.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45073.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tuberose"title="Tuberose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma973695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd973695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152260">xmelldefrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-21">08/21/18 00:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me this smells like a rose, a powdery rose. The first time I wore this, it instantly reminded me of a Johnson Johnson's baby powder, and maybe because of that memory, this fragrance always close to my heart.<br />
I love this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="973695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=973695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent956828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc956828" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bigsly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/28013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.28013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bigsly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma956828ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd956828" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/28013">Bigsly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-28">06/28/18 19:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think I have a recent formulation.  I'd describe the scent as a dirty/animalic "joss stick" incense/sandalwood.  The florals soften it up a bit, but are likely responsible for the stuffy/musty quality.  It may be a bit sweet, but definitely not especially so.  Overall, I could see myself wearing it once it a while, but the longevity was not good, no more than about two hours.  After that, there wasn't much of anything remaining, and I used a full spray to the upper chest and didn't have any clothing on top of it.  Still, since I would only wear this one at home, I could reapply as desired.  Do not buy this if you are a fresh/aquatic/sport scent type guy, unless you want to "walk on the wild side" and probably alienate some friends or colleagues.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="956828"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=956828#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent909031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc909031" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lovetribe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/501028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.501028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lovetribe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma909031ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd909031" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863864" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kageosx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1085731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kageosx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40713.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Much Ado About The Duke"title="Much Ado About The Duke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1085731">kageosx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-23">09/23/17 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind buy.<br />
<br />
I get no rose from this. It's basically talcum powder and little else. <br />
<br />
Not bad, but not great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3938"comment_id="863864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Hammam-Bouquet-3938.html?ccid=863864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent820974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
